mapper.select: SELECT email_notifications AS emailNotifications, push_notifications AS pushNotifications, sms_notifications AS smsNotifications FROM notification_settings WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notification_settings (id, email_notifications, push_notifications, sms_notifications) VALUES (#{id}, #{emailNotifications}, #{pushNotifications}, #{smsNotifications}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE email_notifications = #{emailNotifications}, push_notifications = #{pushNotifications}, sms_notifications = #{smsNotifications};
